snippet: In July, the show “Shark Tank” held auditions in three of the smallest markets where it has done so as part of a promotional campaign from the mobile services provider U.S. Cellular.
abstract: Advertising column; ABC television show Shark Tank holds auditions for aspiring entrepreneurs in Milwaukee, Des Moines and Greenville, NC, as part of advertising and promotional campaign for mobile services provider US Cellular; company focuses on smaller cities and rural areas, where it hopes to strike chord with small businesses through the effort.
lead_paragraph: In July, the show “Shark Tank” held auditions in three of the smallest markets where it has done so as part of a promotional campaign from the mobile services provider U.S. Cellular.

headline.main: For Casting of ‘Shark Tank,’ Cities Are Smaller, but Ideas Stay Big
headline.print_headline: For Show’s Casting, Cities Are Smaller, but Ideas Stay Big
